program main
    implicit none
    integer :: n, m, x, min_val, i, j, k
    integer, allocatable :: a(:,:)
    integer(8) :: n_second, answer, temp_n, sqrt_n
    integer :: count, j_inner

    ! Read first problem's input
    read*, n, m, x
    allocate(a(n, m+1))
    do i = 1, n
        read*, a(i, 1:m+1)
    end do

    ! Initialize min_val to a large value
    min_val = huge(0)

    ! Iterate over all subsets
    do i = 0, 2**n - 1
        integer :: res(m+1)
        res = 0
        do j = 1, n
            if (btest(i, j-1)) then
                res(1) = res(1) + a(j, 1)
                do k = 2, m+1
                    res(k) = res(k) + a(j, k)
                end do
            end if
        end do

        ! Check if all subjects meet the requirement
        logical :: flag = .true.
        do k = 2, m+1
            if (res(k) < x) then
                flag = .false.
                exit
            end if
        end do

        if (flag) then
            if (res(1) < min_val) then
                min_val = res(1)
            end if
        end if
    end do

    ! Determine n_second based on min_val
    if (min_val == huge(0)) then
        n_second = -1
    else
        n_second = min_val
    end if

    ! Compute the second problem's answer
    answer = 0
    if (n_second < 1) then
        ! Handle case where input is -1 (output 0)
        answer = 0
    else
        temp_n = n_second
        sqrt_n = int(sqrt(real(temp_n)))
        do i = 2, sqrt_n
            count = 0
            do while (mod(temp_n, i) == 0)
                temp_n = temp_n / i
                count = count + 1
            end do
            if (count > 0) then
                j_inner = 1
                do while (count - j_inner >= 0)
                    count = count - j_inner
                    answer = answer + 1
                    j_inner = j_inner + 1
                end do
            end if
        end do

        ! Check remaining prime factor
        if (temp_n > 1) then
            count = 1
            j_inner = 1
            do while (count - j_inner >= 0)
                count = count - j_inner
                answer = answer + 1
                j_inner = j_inner + 1
            end do
        end if
    end if

    ! Output the final answer
    print*, answer

end program main
